subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Steve Spagunolo will not become the coach of the Redskins and will instead remain the defensive coordinator of the Super Bow champion Giants with a new, three-year contract making him one of the league’s highest-paid coordinators.
snippet: Steve Spagunolo will not become the coach of the Redskins and will instead remain the defensive coordinator of the Super Bow champion Giants with a new, three-year contract making him one of the league’s highest-paid coordinators.
